doc.after: The identity of the toxic constituents eluded researchers until 1968 when acetaldehyde N methyl N formylhydrazone better known as gyromitrin was isolated 37 Gyromitrin is a volatile water soluble hydrazine compound hydrolyzed in the body into monomethylhydrazine MMH Other N methyl N formylhydrazone derivatives have been isolated in subsequent research although they are present in smaller amounts These other compounds would also produce monomethylhydrazine when hydrolyzed although it remains unclear how much each contributes to the false morel s toxicity 38
